column4: Can someone help me get sound mixing enabled on my system so I can have more than one sound application working at once?
dmix is enabled by default, multiple sounds should be wrking, unless you fiddled with .asoundrc
It's been this way since day one; I can only have one sound app going at once.
try asking in #alsa be patient though, only a few people are capable of helping and they are not always online.
